short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buffer Buddy launches a trivia game while Google Analytics or Data Studio is loading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you spend ages waiting for data to load? 

Do you wonder whether to start another task while you wait?? 

Fear not! 

Buffer Buddy is here to provide you with some light entertainment while you wait. Then when the loading has finished you can seamlessly crack on with the analytics rabbit hole you were in.
